facts.1: Piña Colada is a sweet cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
facts.2: The Piña Colada was created in Puerto Rico in the 1950s.
facts.3: July 10th is celebrated as National Piña Colada Day in the United States.

facts.1: Teddy Bear Picnic Day is celebrated on July 10th each year.
facts.2: The day encourages families to have a picnic with their teddy bears.
facts.3: The holiday is inspired by the song 'The Teddy Bears' Picnic' written by John Walter Bratton.

Day 3.title: Don't Step on a Bee Day

facts.1: Don't Step on a Bee Day is observed on July 10th to raise awareness about the importance of bees.
facts.2: Bees play a crucial role in pollinating plants and crops.
facts.3: The day encourages people to be mindful of bees and their habitats.
